page.title: 12ADULT LIFE STYLES
page.content: 6. 36s TO 50s (contd).They visit restaurants or pubs. more than once a month, but rarely go to the theatre, cinema, art galleries or museums. The women shop weekly. The most popular newspapers are the" "Daily Telegraph", "Times", "Daily Mail" and the local ones. 7. 50s TO 65s. All participants are married, most of them British and living in owner-occupied detached houses with four or more bedrooms. All own a TV, freezer, washing machine and telephone, and most a hi-fi,fridge, dishwasher, tumble dryer, and 2 cars. Less than 1/2 take part in regular sport and few visit theatres, museums or art galleries. They frequently go to restaurants and pubs.,but they spend a lot of time on gardening and DIY. They do no voluntary work or adult education classes.
